# Video
`r qbegin(1)`

Experiments make a frequent appearance in contemporary psychological science. In this video, we discuss why they are important and what we can learn from them. We will illustrate the answers to these questions with the Stroop task.

This video is presented by Aba Szollosi, who is a postdoctoral researcher in Psychology. Contact: [aba.szollosi@ed.ac.uk](aba.szollosi@ed.ac.uk )
